name: My Nintendo Picross: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
overview: My Nintendo Picross: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess is a downloadable puzzle game for the Nintendo 3DS. It is a Picross-based puzzle spin-off game, also known as a nonogram, with a theme based on Twilight Princess. The game launched as an exclusive My Nintendo award to commemorate the program's launch in each region. It costs 1,000 Platinum Points.
